Title: The Match Factory Girl
Actors: Kati Outinen, Elina Salo, Esko Nikkari, Vesa Vierikko
Plot: Iris has a dead-end job in a match-factory, lives with her dour and forbidding parents, and her social life is a disaster. But when she is made pregnant after a one-night stand by a man who thought she was a prostitute, she decides that enough is enough and plans her revenge...
Production: Finnkino Oy, Svenska Filminstitutet, Esselte Video, Villealfa Filmproduction Oy
